parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Teams

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array with all registered task types for the given agent. The values are the names set in <tt>CfgTasks</tt> classes <tt>name</tt> property. The same names are used for [[unregisterTask]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''registeredTasks''' teamMember

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> teamMember: [[Team Member]] - [[teamMember]] [[agent]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value>[[Array]] of [[String]]s - names of tasks

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>tasklist = [[registeredTasks]] [[teamMember]] _agent;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_rabbit = [[createAgent]] ["Rabbit_F", [[position]] [[player]],[], 0, "None"];
[[hint]] [[str]] [[registeredTasks]] [[teamMember]] _rabbit;</code>
Hint shows <tt>["Animal Main Task"]</tt> in Arma 3.

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[registerTask]], [[unregisterTask]], [[sendTask]], [[createTask]], [[currentTasks]], [[taskCompleted]]
</value></part></template>
